name: Vertical Lever Corkscrew with Non-Stick Worm, Compact Rabbit Wine Opener Wine Bottle Opener with built-in Foil Cutter (Red)
about_this_item: Compact But Efficient-Open any wine bottle in just 3 seconds with a quick up-and-down motion
Built-in Foil Cutter- removing foil caps before uncorking.

High Quality- lever corkscrew is constructed of premium zinc alloy with understating matte black finish, the durable screw is compatible with corks of all construction, including natural and synthetic

Go Easy On Your Hand - The ergonomic and heavy duty lever was a standout feature. Extra-long handle design saves effort. This made pulling on the handle much more comfortable and gave a wine enthusiast confidence that the hand wouldn't slip
Gift Box-Drincarier Wine Opener packaged in a sleek, durable box that's perfect for gifting, an excellent gift for the home chef and wine enthusiast

title: Outstanding
content: I've used several corkscrews of this type before, many of them double or triple the price of this unit. This one is much heavier and much sturdier, and it works really well.

title: It works!
content: I thought I had found the greatest cork puller in the world until I replaced it with this one. The key is the LOND and large diameter round lifting handle. Even with arthritis in my hands, it’s a quick and easy job opening a bottle. So glad I stumbled across this because it’s a 10-star tool.

title: Verified Purchase
content: better than the more expensive Rabbit, and so far has lasted longer

title: Easier cork puller than any other
content: I've had a few electric wine bottle openers that tend to lose their charge or strength over time, so I'm happy to have this as a backup manual corkscrew opener.  Made by Drincarier, this matte black steel opener is solid, sturdy, handsome, and works like a charm.  They aren't kidding when they state that a bottle of wine can be opened in 3 seconds.  With little to almost no effort at all, the wine bottle opener delivered (i.e., uncorked) with a single down and up pull from the lever.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I would have a preferred a separate foil cutter, rather than the built-in (which takes a little skill), but its design and use is clever.  I've had a few rabbit-ears style bottle openers over the years, and this unit stands at as being among the best I've ever used. Packaged in a retail box that is ideal for gifting, with instructions for usage, this Drincarier wine bottle opener is ideally and expertly crafted.  Per the box, the unit has a 10-year guarantee.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023

title: good
content: Recommended.  Made in China.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

title: So easy to use
content: I have used this product for about a month and half now. It is extremely easy to open a wine bottle with this. Pull the lever up, place on the bottle neck, squeeze at the neck, pull the lever down, pull the lever up again, the corkscrew is out. To remove the corkscrew from the opener, pull the lever down, squeeze and pull the lever up.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023

title: Extremely Well Made!
content: This Drincarier Vertical Lever Corkscrew with Non-Stick Worm is truly amazing. The corkscrew comes well packaged and gift-ready if looking for a well-made item for the wine lover in your life you have found the one.

title: Sturdy Product
content: It is quite the treat to open wine bottles with this corkscrew - and you can look good doing it :) This makes opening a wine bottle look cool once you get the hang of it. Learning how to use it only takes 30 seconds - but once you got it, you got it! The handle/grip part that you cut the foil with and pull the cork out is easy to use. The unit itself is compact but it is very solid and has a good weight to it. This will be great for the holidays when more wine gets opened around here -  but I know this will be up for the task!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023

title: High quality wine opener
content: This wine opener is smaller and easier for me to use than the name brand that I have.  It has a nice feel enough weight so it still feels substantial.  It pulls corks very well.  I wish it came with additional screws.  The foil cutter takes a little dexterity and practice.  You have to get the wine bottle snugly up in the unit, hold the opener tightly on the wine bottle, and then I turn the bottle while squeezing the opener on the bottle.  I really like this wine opener especially because it is smaller and a little lighter than my old opener.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023

title: So far so good
content: The Drincarier corkscrew wine opener is heavy-duty, and won't bend and break like my previous one.  It effortlessly removes the cork! This would make an excellent gift for wine lovers.

title: Terrific design, I like it better than similar type corkscrew
content: This is it amazing corkscrew, with a nice ergonomic design that I like better than the better known brand name version. The lever that grips the bottle as you remove the cork with the other lever is very easy to use, and I was able to uncork a bottle the first time using it with virtually no issues or hesitation. It has a very nice presentation in its box, with die cut hard foam firmly holding the device. The only unusual thing I noticed is that the illustration on the box shows chrome handles, but the actual corkscrew is completely matte black including the handles. I personally prefer it as all matte black.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
